translations: 吱吱叫，嘎吱作响；紧张（或激动）得尖声说；<非正式>勉强通过，侥幸成功；<非正式>告密，告发
吱吱声，短促的尖叫声；只言片语；<非正式>机会

sentences.sentence: Start Squeak, click Tools, then drag a workspace and transcript window onto your desktop.
sentences.translation: 启动 Squeak，单击工具（Tools），拖拽一个工作空间（workspace）和抄本（transcript）窗口到桌面。

sentences.sentence: She interrupted herself after demonstrating the Squeak by saying she had to go and write something down.
sentences.translation: 当演示完 Squeak 软件后，她停了下来，说自己有事得走了，并在纸上写下了些东西。
他愤怒地发出一声急促的尖叫。
